y'eby'eitaka I-ORG
eine O
obushoboorozi O

, O

ba O

Abazaire O

gw'eby'esente I-DATE
, O

Dr O
Yasin B-PER
Olum I-PER
of O
Makerere B-ORG
University I-ORG
Political I-ORG
Science I-ORG
department I-ORG
says O
Uganda's O
politics O
has O
become O
transactional O
, O
is O
no O
longer O
a O
service O
and O
Museveni B-PER
will O
use O
it O
to O
maximum O
advantage O
Dr O
. O
Yasin B-PER
Olum I-PER
ow'omu O
Yunivasite B-ORG
y'e I-ORG
Makerere I-ORG
mu O
kitongole O
ekisomesa O
eby'obufuzi O
agamba O
nti O
eby'obufuzi O
bwa O
Uganda B-LOC
bifuuse O
bya O

, O

kuweereza O
bantu O
era O
kino O
Museveni B-PER
ajja O

kiganyula O
ye O
. O

President O
Museveni B-PER
will O
definitely O
achieve O
his O
immediate O
objective O
, O
which O
is O
keeping O
himself O
in O
power O
Pulezidenti O
Museveni B-PER
ajja O

ekyo O
ky'ayagala O
, O
nga O
kino O
kwe O
kwenywereza O
mu O

. O

" O
Olum B-PER
, O
who O
is O
an O
expert O
on O
the O

process O
in O
Uganda B-LOC
, O

effects O
of O

of O
our O

will O
be O
borne O
by O
future O
generations O
Olumu B-PER
ate O
nga O
ye O
mukugu O
ku O
nsonga O
ezikwata O
ku O
demokulasiya O
mu O
Uganda B-LOC
, O
naye O
akabi O
akali O
mu O
kufuula O
eby'obufuzi O
okuba O
busineesi O
abanaabaawo O
mu O
biseera O
eby'omu O
maaso O
be O
bajja O
okwolekagana O
nabyo O
. O

The O
Uganda B-LOC
constitution O
limits O
the O
number O
of O
ministers O
and O
their O
deputies O
to O
42 O
but O
, O
in O
a O
bid O
to O
appease O
numerous O
political O
interests O
, O
Museveni B-PER
has O
appointed O
69 O
ministers O
and O
their O
deputies O
, O
hundreds O
of O
RDCs O
, O
Presidential O
Advisors O
, O
and O
other O
state O
agents O
Ssemateeka O
wa O
Uganda B-LOC
akirambika O
nti O
baminisita O
mu O
Uganda B-LOC
awamu O
n'abammyuka O
baabwe O
balina O
kubeera O
42 O
, O
naye O
olw'okuba O
Museveni B-PER
ayagala O
okubaako O
b'asanyusa O
mu O
by'obufuzi O
, O
alonze O
69 O
awamu O

n'abammyuka O
baabwe O
, O
ne O
ba O
RDC O
bangi O
